document_data.name: Tarnmark Lionmantle
document_data.mainbody: '''Tarnmark Lionmantle''' was a [[War Wizard of Cormyr]] in [[1487 DR]].
document_data.History: Tarnmark's mission involved spying on Lord [[Sardasper Halaunt]]. He witnessed the magic battle at the [[Dragon Rampant]] club between [[Manshoon]], [[Shaan]], and many other [[archmage]]s attempting to capture the lord.
